name: kanboard
description: Kanboard is a lean project management tool focused on visualizing work. It offers swimlanes, automations, subtasks and plugins, with a self hosted web interface designed for teams adopting kanban methodologies.
features: Visual Workflow: Kanban boards with swimlanes, drag-and-drop cards, and customizable columns. Visualize work in progress effectively.
Task Automation: Automatic actions, workflow triggers, and event-based rules. Reduce manual work with smart automation.
Subtasks: Break down complex tasks into manageable subtasks with progress tracking. Organize work hierarchically.
Time Tracking: Built-in time tracking, task duration estimates, and time spent reports. Monitor project hours accurately.
Plugin System: Extend functionality with plugins, custom integrations, and third-party extensions. Adapt to your workflow needs.
Multi-User: User roles, permissions, and team collaboration features. Coordinate work across teams.
Analytics: Burndown charts, cycle time, and lead time metrics. Measure team performance and productivity.
Search & Filter: Advanced search, custom filters, and saved queries. Find tasks quickly in large projects.
Recurring Tasks: Automatically create tasks on schedules for routine work. Automate repetitive project activities.
Custom Fields: Add project-specific metadata to tasks with custom fields. Track information relevant to your workflow.
Email Integration: Create tasks from emails and receive notifications. Stay connected to your projects.
Export & Import: Backup projects and migrate data with export/import tools. Maintain data portability.
